name: Sobache serdtse
summary_text: In the wake of the Russian revolution, Professor Preobrazhensky rescues a starving dog from the gutter, and attempts to transform him into a man. Based on Mikhail Bulgakov's novel of the same name.

name: The Nest
summary_text: Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begins to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor.

name: The Naked Kiss
summary_text: Kelly's path towards happiness is thrown amiss when she witnesses a shocking event, which threatens not just her happiness, but her mental health as well.

name: Deuces Wild
summary_text: Bobby, a member of The Deuces, and the sister of the rival Vipers member fall in love, promoting a street war between the two factions.

name: 71 Fragments of a Chronology of Chance
summary_text: 71 scenes revolving around a recent immigrant, a couple that has just adopted a daughter, a college student and a lonely old man.

name: Prevenge
summary_text: Widow Ruth is seven months pregnant when, believing herself to be guided by her unborn baby, she embarks on a homicidal rampage, dispatching anyone who stands in her way.

name: April and the Extraordinary World
summary_text: It's 1941 but France is trapped in the nineteenth century, governed by steam and Napoleon V, where scientists vanish mysteriously. Avril (Marion Cotillard), a teenage girl, goes in search of her missing scientist parents.

name: Class Act
summary_text: A valedictorian and a juvenile delinquent have their school records switched and begin to be treated like the other.

name: Pixote
summary_text: The life of a boy in the streets of Sao Paulo, involved with crimes, prostitution and drugs.

name: Random Harvest
summary_text: An amnesiac World War I veteran falls in love with a music hall star, only to suffer an accident which restores his original memories but erases his post-war life.

name: Teen Spirit
summary_text: The story is about Amber, a mean popular girl who gets electrocuted and dies and is not allowed to enter into heaven unless she helps the least popular girl in school become Prom Queen within a week, but things do not go as planned.

name: Electric Dreams
summary_text: An artificially intelligent PC and his human owner find themselves in a romantic rivalry over a woman.

name: 10 to Midnight
summary_text: An LAPD detective and his rookie partner are on the trail of a psychopathic young man who is murdering young women.

name: The Swarm
summary_text: A huge swarm of deadly African bees spreads terror over American cities by killing thousands of people.

name: The Star
summary_text: A small but brave donkey and his animal friends become the unsung heroes of the first Christmas.

name: Nae yeojachingureul sogae habnida
summary_text: The heart-warming romance story between Kyungjin and Myungwoo. Even though he has passed away, he will be always with Kyungwoo forever.

name: Shimotsuma monogatari
summary_text: Momoko, a strange and seemingly emotionless girl obsessed with 18th century France, befriends a Yanki biker and the two experience the ups and downs of their unusual lives in a rural Japanese town.

name: A Kind of Murder
summary_text: In 1960s New York, Walter Stackhouse is a successful architect married to the beautiful Clara who leads a seemingly perfect life. But his fascination with an unsolved murder leads him into a spiral of chaos as he is forced to play cat-and-mouse with a clever killer and an overambitious detective, while at the same time lusting after another woman.

name: Into the Sun
summary_text: When a government official is killed, an American operative with experience in the Yakuza culture is brought in to investigate.

name: Angel Face
summary_text: Ambulance driver Frank Jessup is ensnared in the schemes of the sensuous but dangerous Diane Tremayne.

name: Wrong Cops
summary_text: A group of bad cops look to dispose of a body that one of them accidentally shot.

name: Arthur Newman
summary_text: A story of a man who fakes his own death and assumes a new identity in order to escape his life, who then moves in with a woman who is also trying to leave her past behind.

name: Wolf Warrior 2
summary_text: China's deadliest special forces operative settles into a quiet life on the sea. When sadistic mercenaries begin targeting nearby civilians, he must leave his newfound peace behind and return to his duties as a soldier and protector.

name: Honey 2
summary_text: Recently released from juvenile detention, talented dancer Maria Ramirez finds an outlet for her passion with a new dance crew.

name: Max
summary_text: A film studying the depiction of a friendship between an art dealer named Rothman and his student, Adolf Hitler.

name: Viva Las Vegas
summary_text: A race car driver preparing for the Grand Prix, wiles his time in Las Vegas working as a waiter to pay for his new engine. Soon, he strikes up a romance with a beautiful young woman.

name: The Zodiac
summary_text: An elusive serial killer known as the Zodiac terrorizes the San Francisco Bay in the late 1960s, while detectives aim to stop him before he claims more victims. Based on a true story.

name: The Soft Skin
summary_text: Pierre Lachenay is a well-known publisher and lecturer, married with Franca and father of Sabine, around 10. He meets an air hostess, Nicole. They start a love affair, which Pierre is hiding, but he cannot stand staying away from her.

name: Pulimurugan
summary_text: When a small village near a forest is under the threat of man eating tigers and a drug mafia, the villagers seek the help of an unstoppable force, a hunter invincible.

name: Mia madre
summary_text: Margherita, a director in the middle of an existential crisis, has to deal with the inevitable and still unacceptable loss of her mother.

name: Rust Creek
summary_text: An overachieving college student gets lost on her way to a job interview. A wrong turn leaves her stranded deep in the Kentucky forest.

name: No Good Deed
summary_text: While doing a friend a favor and searching for a runaway teenager, a police detective stumbles upon a bizarre band of criminals about to pull off a bank robbery.

name: Permanent Midnight
summary_text: A comedy writer struggles to overcome his addiction to heroin.

name: The Milky Way
summary_text: Two drifters go on a pilgrimage from France to Santiago de Compostela in Spain. Along the way, they hitchhike, beg for food, and face the Christian dogmas and heresies from different Ages.

name: I'll See You in My Dreams
summary_text: A widow and former songstress discovers that life can begin anew at any age.

name: Mrs. Winterbourne
summary_text: Connie, unwed and pregnant, is heading to Boston by train when she meets wealthy newlyweds Hugh and Patricia. The train crashes, and when Connie comes to in the hospital, she is mistaken for Patricia, who died in the crash with Hugh.

name: Veeram
summary_text: Vinayagam, an honest man, uses violence to settle disputes. He decides to mend his ways for his lover's sake. Hell breaks loose when he learns about a gang of rowdies following his lover's family.

name: The Secret of the Grain
summary_text: In southern France, a Franco-Arabic shipyard worker along with his partner's daughter pursues his dream of opening a restaurant.

name: As Far as My Feet Will Carry Me
summary_text: At the end of WW2, a German POW doing hard labor in the Soviet Gulag escapes from his Siberian camp to return to Germany but he's pursued by a Soviet NKVD officer.

name: Baby Doll
summary_text: An immature child bride holds her anxious husband at bay while flirting with an amorous Sicilian farmer.

name: The Candidate
summary_text: A Spanish politician whose high-class lifestyle is based on nefarious and illegal business threatens to break his entire party after a newspaper expose him to the public eye.

name: The Poison Rose
summary_text: Inspired by classic film noir, Carson Phillips, an ex-football star turned PI, has a soft spot for a lady in distress.

name: Evidence
summary_text: A detective hunts down a killer using video footage shot by the victims of a massacre at an abandoned gas station.

name: Welcome to Sarajevo
summary_text: Journalist Flynn from the U.S., Michael Henderson from the U.K., and their teams meet at the beginning of the Bosnian war in Sarajevo. During their reports, they find an orphanage run by ...                See full summary »

name: Sweet Bird of Youth
summary_text: A drifter and a faded film star, both traumatized by Hollywood, arrive to the guy's hometown, where the old bitter memories revive again.

name: The Honeymooners
summary_text: Working class New York bus driver Ralph Kramden is always coming up with get-rich-quick schemes for him and his best friend, Ed Norton, who's always around to help him get in (and out of) trouble.

name: Shamitabh
summary_text: An aspiring actor with the inability to speak, joins forces with a man who has a powerful voice. Together they take the film industry by storm, but will their egos get in the way?

name: Dead Heat
summary_text: A cop and his undead partner must chase down the diabolical villain who killed him.

name: Vengeance: A Love Story
summary_text: A group of strangers come to the aid of a single mother seeking to bring her rapists to justice.

name: The Pallbearer
summary_text: A young man's life is thrown into a loop when he is asked to be a pallbearer for the funeral of a classmate he doesn't remember, and his old high school crush temporarily returns to town.

name: Chocolat
summary_text: The rise and fall of the famous clown Chocolat, the first black circus performer who revolutionised the stagnant circus acts and conquered Paris of the Belle Époque with his exuberance and originality.

name: Eyyvah Eyvah 3
summary_text: Life is tough for Geyikli clarinetist Huseyin Badem after marrying his true love, Mujgan. He must grab every opportunity that comes his way to take care of his expanding family, even if it ...                See full summary »

name: Aniara
summary_text: A spaceship carrying settlers to Mars is knocked off course, causing the consumption-obsessed passengers to consider their place in the universe.

name: Cebimdeki Yabanci
summary_text: The seven old friends decide to come together for dinner. Everyone is seated at the table, chatting, eating laughing accompaniment. During the meal, it is decided to play a game. The game ...                See full summary »

name: Talkin' Dirty After Dark
summary_text: The laughs and overlapping love lives of a handful of raunchy stand-up comics at a late-night L.A. comedy club. Dukie's is an L.A. hot-spot featuring a lineup of both novice and notorious comedians who get big laughs with dirty jokes.

name: StageFright
summary_text: A group of stage actors lock themselves in the theater for a rehearsal of their upcoming musical production, unaware that an escaped psychopath has sneaked into the theater with them.

name: Ossessione
summary_text: Gino, a drifter, begins an affair with inn-owner Giovanna as they plan to get rid of her older husband.

name: From Within
summary_text: A small Maryland town is gripped by a curse which causes residents to take their own life one after another.

name: Black Sunday
summary_text: Black Sunday is the powerful story of a Black September terrorist group attempting to blow up a Goodyear blimp hovering over the Super Bowl stadium with 80,000 people and the president of the United States in attendance.

name: A Werewolf Boy
summary_text: Summoned by an unexpected phone call, an elderly woman visits the country cottage she lived in as a child. Memories of an orphan boy she knew 47 years ago come flooding back to her.

name: Phir Bhi Dil Hai Hindustani
summary_text: In order to seek justice for a man who exacts vengeance on a politician, who was responsible for his daughter's death, two rival reporters teams up to help him to prove his innocence.

name: Surviving Picasso
summary_text: The passionate Merchant Ivory drama tells the story of Françoise Gilot (Natascha McElhone), the only lover of Pablo Picasso (Sir Anthony Hopkins) who was strong enough to withstand his ferocious cruelty, and move on with her life.

name: A Turtle's Tale: Sammy's Adventures
summary_text: A sea turtle, who was hatched in 1959, spends the next fifty years travelling the world, while it is being changed by global warming.

name: Gun Shy
summary_text: An undercover DEA agent brings down the Mafia.

name: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
summary_text: Stella is a highly successful, forty-something San Francisco stock broker who is persuaded by her colorful New York girlfriend Delilah to take a well deserved, first-class vacation to Jamaica.

name: Galaxy of Terror
summary_text: Science fiction suspense thriller, in which a rescue space ship crew meets up with horrors projected by their own imaginations.

name: The Driller Killer
summary_text: An artist slowly goes insane while struggling to pay his bills, work on his paintings, and care for his two female roommates, which leads him taking to the streets of New York after dark and randomly killing derelicts with a power drill.

name: Elektra Luxx
summary_text: Life for porn actress Elektra Luxx gets turned upside down when she finds out she's pregnant.

name: The Troops in New York
summary_text: After being chosen to represent France in an international congress, Cruchot and his troops must go to New York, and adapt to its social and cultural aspects.

name: Mara
summary_text: Sophie wakes up, hears scary noises from her parents' bedroom and sees her dad dead. A psychologist arrives there to determine what happened.

name: Viswasam
summary_text: A village ruffian, who settles disputes in his native, takes on a big shot when he tries to sort out the rough patch in his marriage after several years.

name: The Luck of the Irish
summary_text: A teenager must battle for a gold charm to keep his family from being controlled by an evil leprechaun.

name: Vampires: Los Muertos
summary_text: A vampire hunter and a priest fight a band of the walking dead in Mexico.

name: Kill Switch
summary_text: A pilot battles to save his family and the planet after an experiment for unlimited energy goes wrong.

name: Digimon: The Movie
summary_text: Throughout three different stories, Kari Kamiya and her friends take on explosive adventures involving digital creatures.

name: Dismissed
summary_text: An idealistic, straight-edge teacher is drawn down a horrid rabbit hole by an honors student when he gives him a B+ on a paper.

name: The Snake Pit
summary_text: A detailed chronicle of a woman during her stay in a mental institution.

name: A Foreign Affair
summary_text: In occupied Berlin, an army captain is torn between an ex-Nazi café singer and the U.S. congresswoman investigating her.

name: Sink the Bismarck!
summary_text: The World War II story of the Royal Navy's effort to defeat Nazi Germany's most powerful warship.
At 2:37, someone commits suicide in the school lavatory. The day is told up to that point from the viewpoint of six different students.

name: The Troops & Troop-ettes
summary_text: Cruchot and his gendarmes from Saint-Tropez receive a highly responsible government mission - to ensure the safety of four young beautiful female gendarmes officers. In a few days they begin to be abducted by mysterious villains.

name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show: Let's Do the Time Warp Again
summary_text: A straitlaced, square couple, seeking shelter from a storm, find themselves in the castle of a transgender alien mad scientist intent on creating a buff bodybuilder.

name: Good
summary_text: John Halder, a German literature professor in the 1930s, is initially reluctant to accept the ideas of the Nazi Party. He is pulled in different emotional directions by his wife, mother, mistress and Jewish friend.

name: Leningrad Cowboys Go America
summary_text: Siberian rock band Leningrad Cowboys go to the USA in pursuit of fame.

name: The Golem
summary_text: In 16th-century Prague, a rabbi creates the Golem - a giant creature made of clay. Using sorcery, he brings the creature to life in order to protect the Jews of Prague from persecution.

name: Hero Wanted
summary_text: After he awakens in a hospital, a man tracks down and murders the man that left him and a bank teller for dead during a robbery, only to end up having the slain thief's associates come after him in retaliation.

name: Dishoom
summary_text: When India's top batsman goes missing in the Middle East, two mismatched cops must team up for a 36-hour manhunt before the cricket final.

name: San taam
summary_text: A rookie cop teams up with a former detective with a supernatural gift to hunt down a serial killer.

name: Guizi lai le
summary_text: During the Japanese occupation of China, two prisoners are dumped in a peasant's home in a small town. The owner is bullied into keeping the prisoners until the next New Year, at which time...                See full summary »

name: Little Men
summary_text: A new pair of best friends have their bond tested by their parents' battle over a dress shop lease.

name: La tourneuse de pages
summary_text: After failing the audition to a prestigious music school because of the rude behavior of one of the testers, a girl takes revenge by gaining the trust of the same woman some years later and becoming indispensable for her.

name: Wild America
summary_text: Three brothers who are obsessed with animals are given permission from their parents to travel around America with a camera documenting wildlife.

name: Real Gangsters
summary_text: Real Gangsters tells the story of the Lo Giacamo family, one of the most successful crime syndicates in New York City. Run by cousins Vincent Lo Giacamo (Nick Mancuso) and Jack Lo Giacamo (...                See full summary »

name: Phantasm IV: Oblivion
summary_text: Mike travels through time and dimensions to find the Tall Man's origins.

name: Fear X
summary_text: When his wife is killed in a seemingly random incident Harry (Turturro), prompted by mysterious visions, journeys to discover the true circumstances surrounding her murder.

name: Torrente 2: Misión en Marbella
summary_text: Torrente has now moved to Marbella, where, after being wiped out of the money he had gained, has returned to private investigation. But in one of his cases he gets involved in the middle of a villain's missile plot to destroy the city and his own uncle's blackmail operation... and he knows nothing.

name: Life During Wartime
summary_text: Friends, family, and lovers struggle to find love, forgiveness, and meaning in an almost war-torn world riddled with comedy and pathos.

name: Ten
summary_text: A visual social examination in the form of ten conversations between a driving woman and her various pick-ups and hitchhikers.

name: Farewell, My Lovely
summary_text: Los Angeles private eye Philip Marlowe is hired by paroled convict Moose Malloy to find his girlfriend Velma, former seedy nightclub dancer.

name: My Fake Fiancé
summary_text: Cash-strapped virtual strangers Jennifer and Vince decide to stage a fake engagement and wedding just for the presents.

name: Rogue City
summary_text: Caught in the cross hairs of police corruption and Marseille's warring gangs, a loyal cop must protect his squad by taking matters into his own hands.

name: Man on the Train
summary_text: A bank robber arrives to do a job in a small French town and strikes up a friendship with a retired poetry teacher.

name: Herbie Goes to Monte Carlo
summary_text: Herbie, the Volkswagen Beetle with a mind of its own, is racing in the Monte Carlo Rally. Unbeknownst to Herbie's driver, thieves have hidden a cache of stolen diamonds in Herbie's gas tank, and are now trying to get them back.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Tree of Might
summary_text: A group of aliens visit Earth to plant the Tree of Might, a plant that grants cosmic power by draining the Earth's life force.

name: The Brides of Dracula
summary_text: Vampire hunter Van Helsing returns to Transylvania to destroy handsome bloodsucker Baron Meinster, who has designs on beautiful young schoolteacher Marianne.

name: Female Agents
summary_text: London, 1944: SOE's section for French ops parachute 4 women into France, plus a woman there, to free an English geologist and kill SS colonel Heindrich.

name: Touchez Pas au Grisbi
summary_text: An aging, world-weary gangster is double-crossed and forced out of retirement when his best friend is kidnapped and their stash of eight stolen gold bars demanded as ransom.

name: Dead Reckoning
summary_text: A soldier runs away rather than receive the Medal of Honor, so his buddy gets permission to investigate, and love and death soon follow.

name: La Bête Humaine
summary_text: In this classic adaptation of Emile Zola's novel, a tortured train engineer falls in love with a troubled married woman who has helped her husband commit a murder.

name: Diggstown
summary_text: Gabriel's released from prison. His con man friend makes a foolish bet with Diggstown's owner on who'd win the boxing matches - their man against ten Diggstown men.

name: Gotcha!
summary_text: Jonathan plays Gotcha with fellow college students, testing ability as assassin or mark, using paintball guns on campus. He flies to Paris on vacation and, with a woman taking his virginity, on to Berlin, where the game/ammo gets real.

name: Breathe
summary_text: Charlie is an average French suburban teenager, but when she becomes fast friends with Sarah, the rebellious new girl at school, she discovers there's nothing average about how she feels.

name: Angry Video Game Nerd: The Movie
summary_text: The AVGN must overcome his phobia of the worst video game in the world to save his fans.

name: Shorts
summary_text: A young boy's discovery of a colorful, wish-granting rock causes chaos in the suburban town of Black Falls when jealous kids and scheming adults alike set out to get their hands on it.

name: The Veteran
summary_text: A soldier returning from the war in Afghanistan uncovers a conspiracy involving the intelligence services and a gang of drug dealers.

name: Dedh Ishqiya
summary_text: Two lousy crooks find paradise in the seven stages of love.

name: Cloak & Dagger
summary_text: A young boy and his imaginary friend end up on the run while in possession of a top-secret spy gadget.

name: The Recall
summary_text: When five friends vacation at a remote lake house they expect nothing less than a good time, unaware that planet Earth is under an alien invasion and mass-abduction.

name: Leyla Everlasting
summary_text: A resilient housewife, her husband and their marriage therapist become mired in a toxic love triangle and a plot to obtain an antique manuscript.

name: Fragments
summary_text: A group of strangers form a unique relationship with each other after surviving a random shooting at a Los Angeles diner.

name: Critters 4
summary_text: After being cryogenically frozen and waking up on a space station in the near future, the Critters aim to have the unwitting crew for lunch.

name: Love on a Leash
summary_text: Love takes a furry twist in this slice of romantic comedy. A young woman falls for a stray dog with a secret: by night, it becomes a man. Follow the journey of the golden retriever and the friend who gives him a home.

name: Zenon: Girl of the 21st Century
summary_text: An inquisitive teenager pries into suspected dodgy dealings on her space station home - and ends up being sent down to Earth.

name: Death Hunt
summary_text: In 1931 Canada, Yukon trapper Johnson has a feud with a dog owner who later retaliates by publicly accusing Johnson of murder and thus triggering a police manhunt in the wilderness.

name: Henry Fool
summary_text: An introverted garbageman writes his thoughts in a notebook after Henry Fool, writer and ex-con, rents the basement and gives him a notebook and the idea. He writes poetry and Henry helps him along.

name: Rhinestone
summary_text: A country music star must turn an obnoxious New York cabbie into a singer in order to win a bet.

name: No Mercy
summary_text: A Chicago detective, seeking to avenge his partner's death, travels to New Orleans, where he unexpectedly becomes involved in a cat and mouse game of survival.

name: Herr Lehmann
summary_text: In October 1989, the part of the West Berlin borough of Kreuzberg called SO 36, had been largely shut off by the Wall from the rest of the city for 28 years. A lethargic sub-culture of ...                See full summary »

name: The Commune
summary_text: A story about the clash between personal desires, solidarity and tolerance in a Danish commune in the 1970s.

name: Lovely & Amazing
summary_text: Self-esteem and insecurity are at the heart of this comedy about the relationship between a mother and her three confused daughters.

name: Ishaqzaade
summary_text: While fighting for the political supremacy of their respective families, a Hindu man and a Muslim woman share a forbidden romance.

name: The Man Who Came to Dinner
summary_text: An acerbic critic wreaks havoc when a hip injury forces him to move in with a Midwestern family.

name: Bad Milo
summary_text: A man learns that his unusual stomach pains are being caused by a demon living in his intestines.

name: Madeline
summary_text: Horrified at the prospect of her beloved school being sold, a young French girl uses her wit and craftiness to attempt to save it, making an unlikely new friend in the process.

name: Kasi az gorbehaye irani khabar nadareh
summary_text: Iranian musicians Negar and Ashkan look for band members to play at a London concert - and the visas that allow them to leave Tehran to do so.

name: Salak Milyoner
summary_text: The funny treasure hunt of 4 rural brothers in Istanbul, after the recent death of their father who left them a treasure map as heritage.

name: They Look Like People
summary_text: Suspecting that people around him are turning into evil creatures, a troubled man questions whether to protect his only friend from an impending war, or from himself.

name: Fatal Instinct
summary_text: A spoof on thrillers from before 1993 such as Fatal Attraction (1987), Basic Instinct (1992), Chinatown (1974) , Cape Fear (1991) etc. A cop/lawyer cheats on his wife and she on him and plans to kill him for the insurance.

name: Miami Supercops
summary_text: Garret goes to Miami and gets murdered after 7 years in prison for a $20,000,000 bank robbery. The money and the 2 others were never found. The Trinity bros. go to Miami as cops to solve the case this time. Fun fights.

name: Salaam Namaste
summary_text: A quirky take on life and relationships as it looks at a fairy tale with a bit of a squint and an endearing look at what being in love really means.

name: Ek Hasina Thi
summary_text: A woman falls for a charming and mysterious businessman. The whirlwind romance turns sour when she is framed for his underworld crimes. Now, finally out of prison she is ready for sweet revenge.

name: Momo e no tegami
summary_text: Clinging to an unfinished letter written by her recently deceased father, young Momo moves with her mother from bustling Tokyo to the remote Japanese island of Shio. Upon their arrival, she...                See full summary »

name: Tomten är far till alla barnen
summary_text: In what has to be one of the worst ideas in Christmas party planning history, Swedish house wife Sara decides to celebrate the yuletide season with her three ex-husbands and their families....                See full summary »

name: Prefontaine
summary_text: Based on the life of Olympic hopeful Steve Prefontaine, a long distance runner who lived in Oregon and died young.

name: Ulidavaru Kandanthe
summary_text: A journalist sets out to uncover the truth behind an incident, through the perspectives of different people, unraveling how they and their lives are intertwined with it.

name: Third Star
summary_text: James and his three closest lifelong friends go on an ill-advised trip to the stunning coastal area of Barafundle Bay in West Wales. What follows is a touching and comical adventure dealing with friendship, heroism and love.

name: Dolan's Cadillac
summary_text: A young man attempts to seek to avenge his wife's death after she is murdered by a Las Vegas mobster.

name: The Far Country
summary_text: A self-minded adventurer locks horns with a crooked lawman while driving cattle to Dawson.

name: Topper
summary_text: A fun-loving couple, finding that they died and are now ghosts, decide to shake up the stuffy lifestyle of a friend of theirs.

name: Isolation
summary_text: On a remote Irish farm, five people become unwilling participants in an experiment that goes nightmarishly wrong.

name: Jesus' Son
summary_text: A young man turns from drug addiction and petty crime to a life redeemed by a discovery of compassion.

name: Paulette
summary_text: Paulette lives alone in a housing project in the Paris suburbs. With her meager pension, she can no longer make ends meet.

name: Bereavement
summary_text: The horrific account of 6 year old Martin Bristol, abducted from his backyard swing and forced to witness the brutal crimes of a deranged madman.

name: Consenting Adults
summary_text: During a joint dinner at the restaurant, the neighbors offer to exchange wives for one night. It was a joke, but only at first.

name: Sabrina the Teenage Witch
summary_text: Sent by her parents to live with her two eccentric aunts, Sabrina Sawyer discovers on her 16th birthday that she's a witch.

name: Separate Tables
summary_text: The stories of several people are told as they stay at a seaside hotel in Bournemouth which features dining at "Separate Tables."

name: Heaven Knows What
summary_text: A young woman struggles to reconcile her love for her boyfriend and for heroin, as she finds out that suicide is the only way for her boyfriend to forgive her for her misdeed.

name: The Cake Eaters
summary_text: Two families are brought together by the return of one family's son -- a reunion that conjures up old ghosts and issues that must be addressed.

name: Big Ass Spider!
summary_text: A giant alien spider escapes from a military lab and rampages the city of Los Angeles. When a massive military strike fails, it is up to a team of scientists and one clever exterminator to kill the creature before the city is destroyed.

name: Blue Sky
summary_text: Jessica Lange stars in a period drama about a family moving to a military base, and she quickly becomes part of a cover-up involving nuclear bomb tests.

name: Bruna Surfistinha
summary_text: After the adoptive daughter of a stable family leaves them for a new life as a prostitute, she rises to become a popular performer among her clients, and details her routine in her blog.

name: Lajanje na zvezde
summary_text: Comedy about teachers and students at a high school in a small provincial town. Mihailo tries to win the heart of a girl his brother is also chasing.

name: Delta Force 2: The Colombian Connection
summary_text: When DEA agents are taken captive by a ruthless South American kingpin, the Delta Force is reunited to rescue them in this sequel to the 1986 film.

name: Yossi & Jagger
summary_text: Romance blooms between two soldiers (Knoller, Levi) stationed in an Israeli outpost on the Lebanese border.

name: Tesla
summary_text: A freewheeling take on visionary inventor Nikola Tesla, his interactions with Thomas Edison and J.P. Morgan's daughter Anne, and his breakthroughs in transmitting electrical power and light.

name: Little Nemo: Adventures in Slumberland
summary_text: Each night, young Nemo goes to Slumberland and has adventures and befriends the king of Slumberland, Morpheus. But one night Nemo discovers Nightmare Land, and the evil nightmare king, throwing Slumberland and Nemo himself into danger.

name: Pawn
summary_text: A petty robbery spirals into a tense hostage situation after three gunmen hold up a diner that's a front for the mob.

name: Hum Saath-Saath Hain: We Stand United
summary_text: Ramkishen and Mamta have three sons Vivek , Prem and Vinod and a daughter Sangeeta. This family is part of a joint family whose close knit bond is challenged by a misunderstanding.

name: Class of 1999
summary_text: Three ex-military robots are reprogrammed as teachers and secretly placed in a school where most students are part of organized gangs. They begin to respond violently to unruly students, and their military training starts to take over.

name: Agnes of God
summary_text: When a naive novice nun is discovered with a dead newborn in her convent quarters, a court-appointed psychiatrist investigates her case.

name: Nobody's Fool
summary_text: A woman is released from prison and reunites with her sister. She soon discovers that her sister is in an online relationship with a man who may not be what he seems.

name: Mr. Jones
summary_text: After being arrested during a manic episode, a man who suffers from bipolar disorder is treated by a psychiatrist who begins to develop romantic feelings towards him.

name: Clifford
summary_text: A bratty 10-year-old boy is obsessed with visiting a dinosaur-themed amusement park; his uptight uncle takes the wily tyke in for a week and barely lives to regret it.

name: Magical Mystery Tour
summary_text: The Beatles charter a special bus for a surreal mystery tour.

name: Le Jour Se Leve
summary_text: After committing a murder, a man locks himself in his apartment and recollects the events that led him to the killing.

name: Damage
summary_text: An ex-con battles it out in the cage to pay for the operation that would save the daughter of his victim. Along the way he finds fatherly love, and friendship, in the most unlikely of places.

name: Le daim
summary_text: A man's obsession with his designer deerskin jacket causes him to blow his life savings and turn to crime.

name: Kickin' It Old Skool
summary_text: A young breakdancer hits his head during a talent show and slips into a coma for twenty years. Waking up in 2006, he looks to revive his and his team's career with the help of his girlfriend and his parents.

name: Kill Theory
summary_text: Whilst celebrating a graduation at a secluded vacation home, a group of college students find themselves targeted by a sadistic killer who forces them to play a deadly game of killing one another in order to survive.

name: Arsène Lupin
summary_text: As the daring thief Arsène Lupin (Romain Duris) ransacks the homes of wealthy Parisians, the Police, with a secret weapon in their arsenal, attempt to ferret him out.

name: Larger Than Life
summary_text: A motivational speaker discovers that the inheritance his father left for him is in the form of an elephant.

name: Sami Blood
summary_text: A reindeer-breeding Sámi girl who is exposed to the racism of the 1930's at her boarding school, starts dreaming of another life. But to achieve it, she has to become someone else and break all ties with her family and culture.

name: Tanguy
summary_text: Tanguy is 28 years old and still living with his parents. They think it's time he moves out. He doesn't, so they hatch a plan...

name: Delirium
summary_text: A man recently released from a mental institute inherits a mansion after his wealthy parents die. After a series of disturbing events, he comes to believe it is haunted.

name: Phil Spector
summary_text: A drama centered on the relationship between Phil Spector and defense attorney Linda Kenney Baden while the music business legend was on trial for the murder of Lana Clarkson.

name: Gam-si-ja-deul
summary_text: A high-tech police surveillance team attempts to take down a gang of ruthless bank robbers.

name: Class Action
summary_text: An attorney representing a traumatized accident victim finds that his opponent is a very familiar defense attorney - his own daughter.

name: The Big Bang
summary_text: A private detective is hired to find a missing stripper. A simple job turns complicated when everyone he questions ends up dead.

name: The Miracle of Morgan's Creek
summary_text: After an all-night send-off party for the troops, a small-town girl wakes up to find herself married and pregnant, but with no memory of her husband's identity.

name: La casa del fin de los tiempos
summary_text: Dulce is a mother of two who experiences terrifying encounters with apparitions inside her old house, a place where a tragedy occurs. Thirty years later, an elderly Dulce returns home to decipher the mystery that has tormented her for so long.

name: Transylvania 6-5000
summary_text: Two tabloid reporters are sent to Transylvania to find the Frankenstein monster - or get fired. They are laughed at there, but something suspicious is going on.

name: Bal
summary_text: The quiet life of a boy and his family is endangered when his father does not return home from his work collecting honey in the forest.

name: Death of a President
summary_text: Years after the assassination of President George W. Bush in Chicago, an investigative documentary examines that as-yet-unsolved crime.

name: Abril Despedaçado
summary_text: When ordered by his father to avenge the death of his older brother, a young man questions the tradition of violence between two rival families.

name: Clouds
summary_text: Young musician Zach Sobiech discovers his cancer has spread, leaving him just a few months to live. With limited time, he follows his dream and makes an album, unaware that it will soon be a viral music phenomenon.

name: Murder She Said
summary_text: When Miss Jane Marple reports witnessing a murder through the window of a passing train, the police dismiss her as a dotty spinster when no trace of the crime can be found.

name: Ivan the Terrible, Part II
summary_text: As Ivan the Terrible attempts to consolidate his power by establishing a personal army, his political rivals, the Russian boyars, plot to assassinate their Tsar.

name: Dhadkan
summary_text: Anjali and Dev are in love with each other and plan to marry, but her family gets her married to Ram. Years later, Dev shows up to reunite with Anjali, however, she has fallen in love with Ram.

name: Atlas Shrugged II: The Strike
summary_text: Railroad owner Dagny Taggart and steel mogul Henry Rearden search desperately for the inventor of a revolutionary motor as the U.S. government continues to spread its control over the national economy.

name: At the Devil's Door
summary_text: A real-estate agent finds herself caught up in something sinister when she has to sell a house with a dark past and meets the troubled teen who used to live there.

name: Her Alibi
summary_text: Phil has writer's block after 30 detective novels. In court for inspiration, he sees a cute Romanian murder suspect. He provides her alibi. She stays with him. Will he live to write another novel?

name: Jesus of Montreal
summary_text: A group of actors put on an unorthodox, but acclaimed Passion Play which incites the opposition of the Catholic Church while the actors' lives themselves begin to mirror the Passion itself.

name: Super Fuzz
summary_text: Red powder from a nuclear explosion gives a police officer super powers as long as he doesn't see anything red. He is eventually framed for murder and is unsuccessfully executed by many different methods.

name: The Comedian
summary_text: A look at the life of an aging insult comic named Jack Burke.

name: Gekijouban Steins;Gate: Fuka ryouiki no dejavu
summary_text: After the events of the anime, Rintarou begins to feel the repercussions of extensive time travel, and eventually completely fades from reality. Kurisu, being the only companion to remember him, now must find a way to bring him back.

name: The Big Combo
summary_text: A police lt. is ordered to stop investigating deadly crime boss Mr. Brown, because he hasn't been able to get any hard evidence against him. He then goes after Brown's girlfriend who despises him, for information instead.

name: The Lure
summary_text: In Warsaw, a pair of mermaid sisters are adopted into a cabaret. While one seeks love with humans the other hungers to dine on the human population of the city.

name: The Canterbury Tales
summary_text: Pasolini's artistic, sometimes violent, always vividly cinematic retelling of some of Chaucer's most erotic tales.

name: Return of the Killer Tomatoes!
summary_text: Crazy old Professor Gangreen has developed a way to make tomatoes look human for a second invasion.

name: Órbita 9
summary_text: Helena is a young girl who spent all her life in a space pod just after her birth, traveling from Earth to a distant planet where she will reunite with others space colonials, with the ...                See full summary »

name: Love Aaj Kal
summary_text: When professional ambitions clash with personal feelings for a modern-day couple, a love story from a bygone era may offer some wisdom.

name: Vettaiyaadu Vilaiyaadu
summary_text: A Police Officer investigates a series of brutal rapes and murders, with the culprits seeming to cover more than one country.

name: The Fighting Temptations
summary_text: A New York advertising executive travels to a small Southern town to collect an inheritance but finds he must create a gospel choir and lead it to success before he can collect.

name: Foxtrot
summary_text: A troubled family must face the facts when something goes terribly wrong at their son's desolate military post.

name: The German Doctor
summary_text: The true story of an Argentine family who lived with Josef Mengele without knowing his true identity, and of a girl who fell in love with one of the biggest criminals of all time.

name: Gray Matters
summary_text: They finish each other's sentences, dance like Fred and Ginger, and share the same downtown loft--the perfect couple? Not exactly. Gray and Sam, are a sister and brother so compatible and inseparable that people actually assume they are dating. Mortified, they both agree they must branch out and start searching for love. He'll look for a guy for her and she'll look for a gal for him.

name: Two Girls and a Guy
summary_text: 2 girls wait outside a young actor's door and find out he's had them both as "only" girlfriend the last 10 months. They wait inside after breaking in. When Blake comes home he just can't stop lying but they stay.

name: Khartoum
summary_text: In the Sudan, in 1884 to 1885, Egyptian forces led by British General Charles "Chinese" Gordon (Charlton Heston) defend Khartoum against an invading Muslim Army led by a religious fanatic, Mohammed Ahmed el Mahdi (Sir Laurence Olivier).

name: Jolly Life
summary_text: Riza Senyurt is the world's most troubled Santa Claus at Christmas time. For one thing, he doesn't know who Santa Claus is. Whether fake or real however, he is Santa Claus now. Bearing the ...                See full summary »

name: Baska Dilde Ask
summary_text: Onur, who has been deaf since birth, works as a librarian. His father had left him and his mother when he was seven, and Onur has always blamed himself for this. Although being able to ...                See full summary »

name: Breakheart Pass
summary_text: John Deakin is being transported, as a prisoner, on a train with supplies and medicine to Fort Humboldt, Nevada.

name: Isi & Ossi
summary_text: To realize their culinary and boxing dreams, the daughter of a billionaire forms a mutually beneficial alliance with the son of a struggling single mom.

name: Mascots
summary_text: A look into the world of competitive mascots.

name: Ship of Theseus
summary_text: The film explores questions of identity, justice, beauty, meaning and death through an experimental photographer, an ailing monk and a young stockbroker.

name: Sauna
summary_text: As a 25-year war between Russia and Sweden concludes, two brothers who are part of an effort to outline new border accords become undone by their actions, and their mistreatment of a young woman during their journey.

name: Meu Nome Não é Johnny
summary_text: The true story of João Guilherme Estrella ("Johnny"), a young middle-class bon vivant who became a big-time cocaine dealer in Rio de Janeiro in the early 1990s.

name: Julien Donkey-Boy
summary_text: A portrait of the effects of schizophrenia on family life is the central focus.

name: Jug Face
summary_text: When she learns the supernatural pit worshipped by her remote community in the woods has demanded her as a blood sacrifice, Ada struggles to find a way to survive, while the pit lashes out in anger.

name: When Trumpets Fade
summary_text: A private in the latter days of WWII on the German front struggles between his will to survive and what his superiors perceive as a battlefield instinct.

name: Against the Ropes
summary_text: A fictional story inspired by North America's most famous female boxing promoter, Jackie Kallen. Her struggle to survive and succeed in a male dominated sport.

name: The White Balloon
summary_text: Several people try to help a little girl to find the money her mom gave her to buy a goldfish with.

name: White Nights
summary_text: A Russian American ballet dancer's airplane is forced to land in USSR, where he's "repatriated". He stays with an American man married to a Russian. Will the American help him flee USSR?

name: Long Day's Journey Into Night
summary_text: A man went back to Guizhou, found the tracks of a mysterious woman. He recalls the summer he spent with her twenty years ago.

name: One Night with the King
summary_text: In Biblical times, a girl disguises her Jewish origins when the Persian king comes looking for a new bride among his subjects.

name: Eddie and the Cruisers
summary_text: A television newswoman picks up the story of a 1960s rock band whose long-lost leader - Eddie Wilson - may still be alive, while searching for the missing tapes of the band's never-released album.

name: Waking the Dead
summary_text: A congressional candidate questions his sanity after seeing the love of his life, presumed dead, suddenly emerge.

name: The Unthinkable
summary_text: In Swedish film collective Crazy Pictures feature "Den blomstertid nu kommer" Sweden faces a mysterious attack while Alex tries to reunite with his youth love, Anna.

name: Emret Komutanim: Sah Mat
summary_text: There are soldiers who want to be a commander. But these soldiers always hanging around. Commanders want to bring to hell them. But these soldiers always makes jokes and they palters. Meanwhile, one of soldiers deal with him lover.

name: Anne of the Thousand Days
summary_text: King Henry VIII of England discards one wife, Catharine of Aragon, who has failed to produce a male heir, in favor of the young and beautiful Anne Boleyn.

name: Operation Avalanche
summary_text: In 1967, four undercover CIA agents were sent to NASA posing as a documentary film crew. What they discovered led to one of the biggest conspiracies in American history.

name: Mystery Road
summary_text: An indigenous detective returns to the Outback to investigate the murder of a young girl.

name: Kahpe Bizans
summary_text: Kahpe Bizans tells us the story of Yetis Bey(Cem Davran)and his struggle with Byzantian Emperor(Illetyus)in a humorous way.

name: No Smoking
summary_text: A heavily addicted smoker is unprepared for the true price he must pay when he asks a guru's help to kick the habit.

name: Spontaneous
summary_text: Get ready for the outrageous coming-of-age love story about growing up...and blowing up. When students in their school begin exploding (literally), seniors Mara and Dylan struggle to survive in a world where each moment may be their last.

name: Veda
summary_text: Story based on the memoirs of Salih Bozok, which traces the life of Mustafa Kemal Atatürk.

name: A Summer's Tale
summary_text: A shy maths graduate takes a holiday in Dinard before starting his first job. He hopes his sort-of girlfriend will join him, but soon strikes up a friendship with another girl working in ...                See full summary »

name: Robot Overlords
summary_text: Earth has been conquered by robots from a distant galaxy. Survivors are confined to their houses and must wear electronic implants, risking incineration by robot sentries if they venture outside.

name: Children of the Corn III: Urban Harvest
summary_text: Two brothers connected to the murderous children's cult of Gatlin, Nebraska are taken to Chicago by an adoptive couple.

name: Bigger Than Life
summary_text: A seriously ill schoolteacher becomes dependent on a "miracle" drug that begins to affect his sanity.

name: X
summary_text: A veteran call girl and a runaway prostitute witness a murder and must evade the killer as he chases them through Sydney.
